description:
Here at the Lanier Law Group P.A. in Durham, North Carolina, we are fully prepared to fight hard for your rights and entitlements and to increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you deserve for the injuries and losses you suffered as the result of someone else's negligence.

With 11 total offices in North Carolina, we have become one of the state's leading personal injury law firms. During our time in practice, we have recovered millions of dollars for individuals and families adversely affected by any of the following:

• Car accidents
• Medical malpractice
• Catastrophic injuries
• Sexual assault
• Defective products
• Unsafe property conditions
• Other preventable tragedies

In addition, we also handle all types of workers' compensation and Social Security Disability claims, so you can turn to us for help getting the finances you need to support yourself and your family now that you can no longer work.

Devoted to your needs, our law firm's team of dedicated attorneys will sit with you and discuss your options as we devise the most effective strategy aimed at helping you achieve the favorable outcome you seek. Furthermore, our lawyers have earned numerous top rankings from our peers, including designations as Top 100 Trial Lawyers from The National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 High Stakes Litigators. We have also received many positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients for our superior client service.

To begin the process of hiring a heavyweight to fight for you, you can contact the Lanier Law Group P.A. by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation, and we offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe.
